snippet: LEAD: The State Attorney General today sued 25 manufacturers and eight retailers of noncigarette tobacco products in an effort to force compliance with a state law requiring warnings to consumers whenever they are exposed to cancer-causing chemica...
lead_paragraph: LEAD: The State Attorney General today sued 25 manufacturers and eight retailers of noncigarette tobacco products in an effort to force compliance with a state law requiring warnings to consumers whenever they are exposed to cancer-causing chemicals.

headline.main: California Sues to Force Tobacco Warnings
